attributes.action: Make DWP decision makers and assesors responsible for their decisions
attributes.background: I constanly hear of and see reports of people that genuinly need disability benefits harming or taking their own lives due to the DWP rejecting them even though they qualify and hearing of the medical proffesionals blatently lying in the assesments which result in the person being rejected.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes to the assessment process you would like.
